incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

affected_components.name: Virtual Private Servers || Additional services - SGP

incident_updates.body: Start time : 04/10/2022 04:30 UTC End time : 04/10/2022 05:30 UTC Service impact : Public network will be unavailable during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be replacing a network equipment.

Start time : 06/10/2022 00:00 UTC End time : 06/10/2022 02:00 UTC Service impact : Some network flapping during the switchover. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, a network equipment will be replaced.

Start time : 06/10/2022 04:00 UTC End time : 06/10/2022 04:30 UTC Service impact : Public network will be unavailable during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

Start time : 06/10/2022 10:00 UTC End time : 06/10/2022 10:30 UTC Service impact : Public network will be unavailable during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

Start time : 07/10/2022 00:00 UTC End time : 07/10/2022 02:00 UTC Service impact : Some network flapping during the switchover. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, a network equipment will be replaced.
The maintenance has been postponed. Here is the new schedule : Start time : 08/10/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 08/10/2022 10:00 UTC

Start time : 27/09/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 27/09/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of all services behind the concerned devices for 30 minutes each one. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on some network equipment.

Start time : 11/10/2022 10:00 UTC End time : 11/10/2022 10:30 UTC Service impact : vRack network will be unavailable during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

Start time : 12/10/2022 10:00 UTC End time : 12/10/2022 10:30 UTC Service impact : vRack network will be unavailable during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

Due to an imponderable we have to postpone the intervention.
 We will post a new update to indicate the new maintenance dates
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 22/09/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 22/09/2022 11:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will upgrade the version of multiple network equipment.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 02/10/2022 22:00 UTC End time : 04/10/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : Servers will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the operation. Related Incident : [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 45B27 Service improvement : We are moving over the servers from rack 45B27. This resolved the issue with the remote reboot device being unavailable.
